name: @db-ui/components
author: General technical components out of DB UX Design System

scripts.compile:angular: mitosis build -c mitosis-angular.config.js && tsx scripts/exec/angular.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/angular/src ../../output/angular/src -o
scripts.compile:react: mitosis build -c mitosis-react.config.js && tsx scripts/exec/react.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/react/src ../../output/react/src -o
scripts.compile:vue: mitosis build -c mitosis-vue.config.js && tsx scripts/exec/vue.ts && cpr ../../output/tmp/vue/src ../../output/vue/src -o
scripts.dev:angular: nodemon --watch src --watch overrides -e tsx,ts -x "npm run compile:angular"
scripts.dev:html: npm run copy-assets && npm run build-assets && npm run build-style:01_sass && vite --open
scripts.dev:lit: nodemon --watch src --watch overrides -e tsx,ts -x "npm run compile:lit"
scripts.dev:react: nodemon --watch src --watch overrides -e tsx,ts -x "npm run compile:react"
scripts.dev:vue: nodemon --watch src --watch overrides -e tsx,ts -x "npm run compile:vue"
scripts.start: nodemon --watch src --watch scripts --watch overrides -e js,tsx,ts,scss,json -x "npm run build"
